title: My lague just crashed ... why am I punished ???
body: Why does the client crashes 3 times per day...??? And the most annoying part is that I have to pay the price taking the leaver-buster . the only app in my pc that does that is your game riot.

replies.body: If you can give me more details as to what error messages you see or behavior during the crash, I can assist you in finding a solution.

during champ select it goes all weird and it won't let me select or lock my pick, in some cases it goes weirder at the point that the chat despair from the client along with the summoners spells and the icon of the wards. i'll send u a picture as soon as it happened again.

No need to wait until it happens again, I think I know what's going on. It sounds like your client occasionally encounters issues maintaining a strong connection to the matchmaking servers. This is often caused by local network settings that prevent a good link from happening.

I strongly recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step. Let me know if those steps caused any change at all.
